com.twilio.ipmessaging

Class TwilioIPMessagingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twilio.ipmessaging.TwilioIPMessagingClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TwilioIPMessagingClientImpl

    public class TwilioIPMessagingClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an IP Messaging client connection to Twilio. It holds the product-level client context.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeSDK

        public static void initializeSDK(Context inContext,
                 TwilioIPMessagingClient.InitListener inListener)
        Initialize the TwilioRTD Client SDK.
        Parameters:
        inContext - The Application Context from your Android application. Make sure you don't pass an Activity Context. You can retrieve the Application Context by calling getApplicationContext() on your Activity. Cannot be null.
        inListener - A TwilioIPMessagingClient.InitListener that will notify you when the service is ready. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        listener - the listener for thisIP MessagingClient.
        Returns:
